name: Bamboo Toothbrush
description: Eco-friendly bamboo toothbrush with soft biodegradable bristles. A sustainable alternative to plastic toothbrushes.

name: Reusable Stainless Steel Water Bottle
description: Durable stainless steel water bottle that keeps drinks hot or cold for hours. Perfect for daily use.

name: Organic Cotton Tote Bag
description: Reusable organic cotton tote bag for shopping and daily errands. Lightweight, washable, and plastic-free.

name: Reusable Bamboo Cutlery Set
description: Portable bamboo cutlery set including fork, spoon, knife, and straw. Ideal for travel and office use.

name: Compostable Phone Case
description: Biodegradable phone case made from plant-based materials. Strong, stylish, and eco-conscious.

name: Beeswax Food Wraps
description: Natural beeswax food wraps used to replace plastic wrap. Reusable and compostable.

name: Eco-Friendly Notebook
description: Notebook made from recycled paper with a minimal design. Perfect for students and professionals.

name: Solar Powered Desk Lamp
description: Energy-efficient desk lamp powered by solar energy. Ideal for workspaces and study tables.
